Shivah::

Shivah took his other swork and with both Blocked Ragnus's strike and 
said "I'm Shivah, Blackfortress's second in rank and you Ragnus will 
die for invade Predacon's territory..."


Shivah's three heads moved and tried to bite Ragnus's neck.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "redragnus" <ragnus_@h...> wrote:
> //Ragnus//
> 
>   Ragnus pauses before his next strike, using the other bot's 
> hesitation to remove a seond cylinder, that is his second sword, 
yet 
> he doesn't ignite it.
>

> me Ragnus.  And my status..." he gives an insane smile, "...I am 
the 
> executioner."
